snippet: A Chicago wedding for the community service director of the Brearley School, a private school in New York, and an associate director of Standard & Poor’s, the New York credit-rating agency.
lead_paragraph: Olivia Jane Franks Metzger, the daughter of Susan E. Anderson and Donald L. Metzger of Chicago, was married there Saturday to Alexander Ryff Dennis, a son of Carol D. Ryff of Verona, Wis., and Jack S. Dennis of Cross Plains, Wis. The Rev. Calum I. MacLeod performed the ceremony at the Fourth Presbyterian Church. Ms. Metzger, 28, will keep her name. She is the community service director at the Brearley School in New York. She oversees the school's student volunteer activities. She graduated from Yale and is to begin studying for a master's in counseling psychology at Northwestern University in September.
